title: For 300 golds, you can remove 2 champions from ARAM

replies.body: Uh, no. Oracles is 100% needed or Teemo just autowins ARAM. _**Even with Oracles**_ he has a 60% winrate in ARAM. Sorry you can shroom up the entire map with absolutely zero counterplay and chunk people for half their HP per shroom with no effort at all in the mode where the map is tiny and you cant base to heal. His shrooms are still extremely effective but you actually have to be smart about how you use them
You realize that teemo is broken without that item? Also people usually do not even realize it is there and you are now bringing more awareness to it xD

Yes, and with this item Teemo is useless. It's not "counterplay" it's just "fuck you I don't want to deal with you". Counterplay is something like {{item:3364}} 

This shit lasts for 5 MINUTES for 300 golds

Lol a good Teemo will start throwing his shrooms into the minions and the bunched up champions during team fights. Oracles does nothing to prevent this and is a waste of 300 gold at that point.

Both of which are still very strong even with oracles. Teemo still has mass damage and clearing shrooms mid combat isnt easy, and shaco can still easily protobelt stab cheese destroy a squishy, and in combat w.
Twitch too, he has stealth ability
You don't need oracles for Twitch

{{champion:29}} AA range is longer (or equal) to this "detection area", so it doesn't affect him. On the other hand, if the enemy buys {{item:2013}} and you're {{champion:35}}, first your W becomes useless, second, your Q is basically using {{summoner:4}} to engage someone, since they can see you.
This is legit the one form of counterplay we have against that urf cancer

Neither teemo nor shaco are just about traps.

Try out attack speed teemo and ludens shaco next time ;)

ARAM isnt goign to be balanced.

imagine this:

u are a darius.

enemy has teemo and shaco.

its a literal minefield between shrooms and boxes.

w/o oracles your guarenteed to die before you can GET to the enemy. Every health pad would be a mine. every bush a trap.


Between godly uncounterable and counterable but weaker which do you pick?
